posts.post_content:
[Kira, Great Glass-Spinner](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Kira, Great Glass-Spinner) (autocard does not work due to censor) is nice with this and it's blue counterpart, granting your creatures effective shroud.
  
   
Also, dropping this before or after (generally before) a [Wrath of God](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Wrath of God) is a good way to ensure your opponent doesn't catch up quickly, especially if they are playing swarm decks or similar aggro. Keep a few instant-speed removal spells behind to deal with the creatures that slowly drip out.
posts.html:
Kira, Great Glass-Spinner (autocard does not work due to censor) is nice with this and it's blue counterpart, granting your creatures effective shroud.

Also, dropping this before or after (generally before) a Wrath of God is a good way to ensure your opponent doesn't catch up quickly, especially if they are playing swarm decks or similar aggro. Keep a few instant-speed removal spells behind to deal with the creatures that slowly drip out.
Report Abuse

posts.post_content: Arcane Laboratory, while having the same function, is preferred by me, simply because blue in itself has more ways to counter/shut down an opponent than white. Although if one plays WU control, either enchantment works out well.
